body.content: Ah, Bianca. Indeed it is. I trust the currents of Venice are treating you... pragmatically. I find myself with certain ventures that require a keen eye for tangible value. Perhaps our paths cross for a reason beyond mere pleasantries?

As a Popolani, I must always seek efficient arrangements to expand my influence and wealth, especially with fellow citizens who understand the daily grind.
